name: Shiro
overview: Can you defeat the evil witch Satella? Holo and Shiro are twin sisters who have travelled the world since childhood in search of adventure. One day, they were attacked by the evil witch Satella, who took Shiro to her gloomy cave... Can you help Holo find her twin sister? You must overcome dense forest, an ancient temple, dangerous dungeons and destroy a multitude of enemies with your trusty sword. Join Holo in the most dangerous journey of her lifetime in this pixelated adventure platformer! Features: • Balanced combat and platforming • Cunning puzzles and traps • Over 25 levels • Unique events and mini-games
